metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36403 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Moodle, in some circumstances, email notifications of messages could have the link back to the original message hidden by HTML, which may pose a phishing risk.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
